firstNightReminder: Show the 'This is the Demon' card. Point to the Demon.
name: Prophet
ability: You start knowing the Demon. If you are 'mad' that that player is evil or that you are the Prophet, your team loses, even if you are dead.
flavor: A vision that was planted in my brain still remains...

firstNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players who woke up tonight (including the Bellhop).
otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players who woke up tonight (including the Bellhop).
name: Bellhop
ability: Each night, you learn how many players woke up.

otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) for the number of players that nominated a player of different alignment today.
name: Messenger
ability: Each night*, you learn how many players nominated a player of different alignment.
flavor: Saying nothing is also saying something.

otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of true statements.
name: Tribute
ability: On your 1st day, each player may make a public statement. That night, you learn how many were true.
flavor: You'll stand before your own horn of plenty, ready to receive all that is waiting to come to you.

firstNightReminder: The Smuggler points to a player. If that player is evil: show the Smuggler the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign. Mark the Smuggler with the 'No ability' reminder. Otherwise, if that player would wake tonight: Mark that player with the 'Drunk' reminder. Have the Smuggler carry out that player's action (interact with the Smuggler the same way you would that player, but don't say that player's role).
otherNightReminder: The Smuggler points to a player. If that player is evil: show the Smuggler the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign. Mark the Smuggler with the 'No ability' reminder. Otherwise, if that player would wake tonight: Mark that player with the 'Drunk' reminder. Have the Smuggler carry out that player's action (interact with the Smuggler the same way you would that player, but don't say that player's role).
name: Smuggler
ability: Each night, choose a player. If they would wake tonight, they are drunk & you gain their ability until dusk. If you choose an evil player, you become evil & lose your ability.
flavor: I know how to get things.

name: Trickster
ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the evil Demon, even if dead.
flavor: I am looking for the one I can't fool.

name: Draggletail
ability: Your 2 alive Townsfolk neighbours are poisoned.

otherNightReminder: If no living player was executed today: The Cheesemonger points to player. That player dies.
name: Cheesemonger
ability: Each night*, if no living player was executed today, choose a player: they die.

firstNightReminder: When the first night has ended, declare that the Omen is in play, and which player it is.
otherNightReminder: The Omen points to a player. That player dies.
name: Omen
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. All players know who you are. If any of your Minions live, you cannot die.

otherNightReminder: The Sphinx points to a player. That player dies.
name: Sphinx
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you die (ending the game), publicly guess all players' characters. If you are correct, your team wins.
flavor: All is a riddle, and the key to a riddle... is another riddle.

firstNightReminder: At the start of the game, if there are any homebrew characters on the character sheet or you are running homebrew rules, declare that the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all the homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.
